articles.author: Olivia Willis, Carl Smith, Dayvis Heyne, Joel Zander, Joel Werner, Natalie Whiting
articles.title: Polio was eliminated in the Asia-Pacific. Then it suddenly came back - ABC News
articles.description: How did a disease that had not been seen in the Asia-Pacific region for almost two decades suddenly reappear?
articles.content:
One morning in April 2018, six-year-old Gafo woke up with aching legs.
"Thursday morning he woke up from bed, he said his leg was hurting and he fell over," his dad Maya told 7.30.
